titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University MS Or 448: al-Kāfiyah

availability.licence: These images and the content of Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 448: al-Kāfiyah are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

To the extent possible under law, Columbia University, Rare Book & Manuscript Library has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this metadata about Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 448: al-Kāfiyah. This work is published from: United States. For a summary of CC0, see https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. Legal code: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode.

notesStmt.note: Four stamps and an owner's note, mostly scrubbed (f. 1r); notations and calculations in ink (flyleaves i-iii at front of book).

supportDesc.extent: iv, 90, ii leaves : 142 x 87 (82 x 46) mm, bound to 142 x 85 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻlīq, with strong elements of naskh in black ink; pointed.

decoDesc.decoNote: Blue and gold headpiece (f. 1v); rubrications in red; border-rules and page-opening frame-rule in red.

binding.p: Dark brown leather with gilded central mandorla.

origin.p: Copy completed at the end of Dhū al-Ḥijjah 988 A.H. (f. 90v).

history.provenance: Gift of Helen R. Hull, 1968 (library bookplate inside front cover).
